snippet: President Obama visits California to review the damage from the drought. Also on the Minute, anti-government protests in Venezuela escalate and Season 2 of “House of Cards” premieres on Netflix.
abstract: President Obama visits California to review the damage from the drought. Also on the Minute, anti-government protests in Venezuela escalate and Season 2 of “House of Cards” premieres on Netflix.

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
